question: Q1. The manager asked everyone to arrive ______ 8:30 for the morning meeting.
Q2. Our company plans to ______ its new product line next month.
Q3. The meeting has been postponed ______ further notice.
Q4. Please make sure that all documents are ______ before you submit them.
Q5. Due to the heavy rain, the outdoor concert was ______ canceled.
Q6. The new intern was praised for her ability to handle tasks ______.
Q7. Customers who purchase more than $50 will receive a free ______.
Q8. The hotel offers complimentary breakfast for all ______ guests.
Q9. Because of the new policy, employees must submit their reports ______ the deadline.
Q10. Mr. Chen was promoted to sales manager ______ his outstanding performance.
